The expert's verdict clarifies that the photographs are not authentic and explains that the first photograph is actually of a US Airways jet that made an emergency landing in the Hudson River in 2009, while the second photograph shows a Lion Air Boeing 737 airliner that crashed into the sea in Bali in 2013.
The expert: s verdict emphasizes that the Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 has not been located yet, and no determination has been made regarding its crash or landing.
